jd: From: Surya, Kriscon suryap@krisconit.com Reply to: suryap@krisconit.com Sr. Pega Developers Location Pref : Austin, TX (1st choice) the client can also consider Morris Plains, NJ or STL, MO or Memphis, TNNote : Certified LSA’s are desired.Job Description: Demonstrated experience in Agile development, application design, software development, and testingDesigning class structures, application frameworks, and data modelsExpertise in object-oriented analysis and design across a variety of platformsExperience and thorough understanding of Pega RULES Process Commander System or other Business Process Management (BPM) systemIntegrating business databases, legacy systems, and web services.Troubleshooting application issues, coding bugs, and bottlenecks.Maintaining the security of all system applications.Coordinating with the project team to ensure the business architecture matches the needs of the customer.Performing solution architecture within the Pega PRPC environment.Ability to effectively communicate to internal and external business partners on solution designPega Developer Requirements:Proven work experience as a Pega developer.Advanced knowledge of Pega PRPC 5.x/6.x/7.x.Familiarity with J2EE, XML, Java, JSP, and EJB.Familiarity with Scrum and Agile methodology.Knowledge of coding languages including Angular JS, Java, and jQuery.Knowledge of web technologies including JavaScript, CSS, HTML5, and XML.Excellent project management skills.Ability to troubleshoot complex software issues
